Text:
A big thanks for this.  I love Neruda's "Memoirs" and was hoping you might have a copy.

For readers interested in Neruda's poetry, see http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8349474 (shameless plug).

@penfag: And thank you for reminding me I had it! I'd created this awhile back, then forgot about until your Neruda reminded me.

I meant to link to your Neruda, but forgot to, so I'm glad you took the initiative!
